# Assignments for Unit 2 - Environmental Justice {#sec-assignment2}

::: {.callout-note appearance="simple"}
This includes the list of assignments for Unit 2 - Environmental Justice
:::

```{r}
#| label: tbl-unit2assignments
#| tbl-cap: Assignments from Unit 2
#| echo: false
#| warning: false
library(dplyr)
library(kableExtra)

assignment <- c('Wiki entry on Environmental Justice')
due.Date <- c('Sept 21, 2022')
source <- c('https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Environmental_justice')

unit2 <- data.frame(assignment, due.Date, source)# %>% 

unit2 %>% mutate(link = cell_spec(row.names(.), 'html', link = source)) %>% 
  select(-source) %>% 
  kableExtra::kable('html', escape = FALSE) %>% 
  kable_material_dark(c('condensed', 'hover')) %>% 
  column_spec(1, width = '20em') #%>

```
